guidanceItem.title: Unused services are disabled.
guidanceItem.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that all unused services are disabled. Also make sure that Trivial File Transfer Protocol (TFTP) is disabled, Internet-facing administration points are removed, and ACLs are configured to limit administrative access.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
